title: YD Sign Centre
author: YD Sign Centre
created_time: November 01, 2022, 06:04:37 AMLast edit: December 31, 2022, 12:38:34 PM by YD Sign Centre
content: TERMS AND CONDITIONS1. Join VOLLEY Token Telegram Group2. Bounty Manager and Team has the right to make changes to the provisions at any time.3. If you have any questions or complaints Please ask your bounty-related questions with the Bounty Manager or fill out the Complaint Form.4. Every Twitter, Tiktok, Article, and Video participants obligatory to report their work on the form provided.5. Participant is forbidden to duplicate other people works.6. By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address you submitted is final and can't be changed.7. Bounty program organizers can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers, We are responsible only for managing the campaign. 8. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity.9. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.10. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. 11. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.12. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.13. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.Note: This campaign is not escrowed. Distribution of VOLLEY Bounty will be done by project team after launching.Proof Of Registration Post Format:Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address: BOUNTY ALLOCATIONTwitter : 30%Tiktok : 30%Video : 20%Article : 20%=========================================BOUNTY DURATIONBounty Program will last for 2 MonthsWEEK 1 (02.11) - (08-11)WEEK 2 (09.11) - (15-11)WEEK 3 (16.11) - (22-11)WEEK 4 (23.11) - (29-11)WEEK 5 (30.11) - (06-12)WEEK 6 (07.12) - (13-12)WEEK 7 (14.12) - (20-12)WEEK 8 (21.12) - (END, 27-11)SPREADSHEETCOMPLAIN FORMRewards:1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow VOLLEY Token Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 2 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use @Volleytoken @Binance $VOY #Volley #Volleytoken #Defi hashtags in every retweet and tweet.How to join:1. Join the VOLLEY Token official Telegram Group.2. Fill the registration form: JOIN HERERewards:1. Have more than 100 views: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1000 views: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 views: 4 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 views: 5 stakes/week5. Have more than 50,000 views: 10 stakes/weekRules:  1. Participants must have at least 100 Followers.2. Each participant can send maximum 2 videos per week.3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Tokensale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.6. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded.7. Poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.8. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have the project's website.5. Participants must use #VOLLEY #VOYToken hashtags in every video.How to join:1. Join the VOLLEY Token official Telegram Group.2. Fill the registration form: JOIN HERERewards:High quality: 5 stakesGood quality: 3 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Participants must have at least 100+ youtube subscribers. Videos need to be a minimum of 2 minutes in length.2. Each participant can send 2 video only.3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features,   Tokensale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.6. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded.7. Poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.8. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, or any other social media.10. Please provide the wallet address and enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure athenticity. This will be verified!How to join:1. Join the VOLLEY Token official Telegram Group.2. Fill the registration form: JOIN HERERewards:High quality: 5 stakesGood quality: 3 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:  1. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.(Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards).Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 50 claps would be taken note of.2. Poor quality articles will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on quality.3. Each participant can write 2 article only.4. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium, and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.Other high-ranked blogs may be accepted.5. Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Pre Sale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.6. Articles should never be removed.7. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project,   project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, or any other social media.8. Please provide a Wallet address and enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure athenticity. This will be verified!How to join:1. Join the VOLLEY Token official Telegram Group.2. Fill the registration form: JOIN HERE
